CustomField.description: This field is used to show the Icons for Waste Infra Field Workers Schedule List screen on mobile
CustomField.formula: IF ( FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Waste Infra", IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority, "1"),ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority, "2" )),"üö®","") & IF( (DateTIMEValue(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_OpenDate__c + (FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c / 24)) - NOW())*24*60 <= 30 ,"üö©","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_VulnerableCustomer__c = True ,"ü§≤","") & IF(FSM_CheckTMA__c = True,"üö¶" ,"") & IF(FSM_ServiceOrderType__c = "ZPM3","‚ùóÔ∏è","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CustomerAtRiskofDissatisfaction__c = True ,"‚ö†Ô∏è" ,"") & IF( FSM_CustomerAppointment__c = True ,"üè†","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_MeasuringPointCount__c > 0 ,"üìê","") & IF( NOT(IsBlank(FSM_ConstraintStart__c)) ,"üìÜ",""),"")
CustomField.label: Icon for Waste Infra
